T10TD4172E:1b-1: sa tya kritya dharmma ba tsa na sad dharmma shr'a ba ka th'a /
T10TD4172E:1b-3: chos smra ba dang dam pa'i chos nyan pa la gus par bya ba'i gtam /
T10TD4172E:1b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur [dd] gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T10TD4172E:1b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gser btsom dang karni ka dang nyi ma shar ma thag gi 'od 'bar zhing gsal bar byed pa dang /
T10TD4172E:1b-6: rgya cher mi phyed pa'i 'od dang /
T10TD4172E:1b-7: bco lnga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa dang /
T10TD4172E:1b-9: aa sho ka rab tu rgyas pa dang /
T10TD4172E:1b-15: glog gi 'od pas lhag pa dang /
T10TD4172E:1b-16: gser bzang po'i 'od dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma /
T10TD4172E:1b-17: dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T10TD4172E:1b-18: rin po che'i gter bsdus pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mgon du gyur pa /
T10TD4172E:1b-22: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis gnod pa med par kun du spyod pa //
T10TD4172E:2a-1: mi 'jigs pa bzhis brnyengs pa mi mnga' ba /
T10TD4172E:2a-2: khyu mchog gi mchog / seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa /
T10TD4172E:2a-20: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa /
T10TD4172E:2a-23: dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyis bsam gtan mchog gi dran pa brnyes pa /
T10TD4172E:2a-24: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T10TD4172E:2a-26: yang dag par spong ba rnams la lhag par mos pa /
T10TD4172E:2a-27: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /
T10TD4172E:2a-28: zad par gyi skye mched dang //
T10TD4172E:2a-29: stong pa nyid dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa dang /
T10TD4172E:2a-30: thugs rje chen pos yang dag par bskul ba /
T10TD4172E:2a-38: zla ba'i 'od rnams las lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba /
T10TD4172E:2b-3: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la sogs pas gsungs shing rjes su bstan pa 'di la /
T10TD4172E:2b-6: chos kyi gtam la 'ga' zhig tu tshogs shing 'dug ste /
T10TD4172E:2b-7: 'dug nas bya ba gnyis pa gang yang rung ba gcig gi rjes su gnas par bya ste /
T10TD4172E:2b-8: chos kyi gtam bya ba'am yang na 'phags pa'i mi smra bas rjes su gnas par bya'o //
T10TD4172E:2b-9: de la 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i gtam du gyur pa dang /
T10TD4172E:2b-10: 'phags pa'i mi smra bar gyur pa de gnyis ni nges par legs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin te /
T10TD4172E:2b-11: phyis mi rtog pa'i phyir dang /
T10TD4172E:2b-12: the tshom gcod pa'i phyir nges par stobs kyis gzung ba'i phyir de skad du /
T10TD4172E:2b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal zhing 'di skad du gsungs so //
T10TD4172E:2b-14: dge slong dag gang zag gnyis po 'dis bsod nams mang po bskyed de sdig pa'i rtsa ba 'byin zhing bdud dang g-yul 'gyed par byed /
T10TD4172E:2b-15: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol bar byed /
T10TD4172E:2b-16: chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed /
T10TD4172E:2b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do //
T10TD4172E:2b-19: gang gus par byas te chos 'chad pa dang /
T10TD4172E:2b-20: gang 'di na gus par byas te chos nyan pa'i //
T10TD4172E:2b-21: de bas na khyed kyis gus pas chos bshad par bya zhing bla ma rnams la gus par bya ste chos mnyan par bya'o //
T10TD4172E:2b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'byung ba dkon no //
T10TD4172E:2b-23: mir skye ba ni rab tu dkon no //
T10TD4172E:2b-24: dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no //
T10TD4172E:2b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa ni dkon no //
T10TD4172E:2b-26: de bas na 'khor ba'i nyes pa la kun du brtags pa la gus par byas te chos mnyan par bya'o //
T10TD4172E:2b-29: nges par dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur zhing chos kyi snang ba dang bral bar 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:2b-30: ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu nub par 'gyur la /
T10TD4172E:2b-31: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par mi 'gyur te /
T10TD4172E:2b-32: rab tu 'jig pa dang bcas pa'i dus nye bar gnas shing /
T10TD4172E:2b-33: chos dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur bar shes par byas nas gus par byes te chos mnyan par bya'o //
T10TD4172E:3a-2: ye shes kyi ri ni rdib par 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:3a-3: chos kyi nyi ma ni nub par 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:3a-4: chos kyi chu bo ni skam par 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:3a-5: chos kyi gtam gyis ni dben par 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:3a-6: dbang po'i rtod thag ni chad par 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:3a-7: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog ni skram par 'gyur ;
T10TD4172E:3a-8: gsung rab kyi rgya mtsho ni bo bar 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:3a-9: dran pa'i lcag ni chag par 'gyur /
T10TD4172E:3a-10: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
T10TD4172E:3a-11: nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur la /
T10TD4172E:3a-12: ring por mi thogs par yang dag pa'i spang leb bshig pas bcos legs byas pa ;
T10TD4172E:3a-13: dran pa'i gru skya bas yongs su bsrung ba /
T10TD4172E:3a-15: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan legs par btsugs pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi zhal ce pas rtsod pa yongs su sbyong ba /
T10TD4172E:3a-17: dad pa'i lam brgyags dang ldan pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-18: brtse pa'i btung chu'i tshogs dang bcas pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-19: dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi lam gyi rin po ches yongs su bkang ba dang /
T10TD4172E:3a-20: slob ba dang mi slob pa'i tshogs yongs su rgyu ba /
T10TD4172E:3a-21: chos smra ba'i bya bas rab tu sad par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bad pas rab tu 'phel zhing spogs phyin pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-22: dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis bcos pa'i rgya mtsho dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis bskyod pa ;
T10TD4172E:3a-23: dam pa'i chos kyi gru thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par 'gyur ro zhes shes par byas la /
T10TD4172E:3a-24: sems can rnams kyi khong du chud par bya ba la 'bad pas dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs nub pas phyis yid la gcags pa med par bya ste /
T10TD4172E:3a-25: 'jig rten ma rig pas mig long ba /
T10TD4172E:3a-26: ser sna'i dag ba bas g-yogs pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-27: phyogs dang mtshams la rtag pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3a-28: chad par rnam par lta ba /
T10TD4172E:3a-29: skye ba dang rgab dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang /
T10TD4172E:3a-30: sdug bsngal gyis kun du gdungs pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-32: 'khor ba'i rtod thag gis kun du brtod pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-33: gshin rje'i pho nyas skrag pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-34: bya ba ngan pa la chags pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
T10TD4172E:3a-35: phan tshun rtsod pas g-yengs pa'i sems can rnams phyin chad yid la gcags par mi 'gyur ro //
T10TD4172E:3a-36: de bas na 'khor ba'i nyes pa spang bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3a-37: bdud kyi spyod yul spang bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3a-38: phung po'i khur dor bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-0: @3b nyon mongs pa'i shing gcad par 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-1: ye shes kyi rdo rje 'chang bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-2: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo phye mar brlag par 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-3: ser sna'i rgya mtsho skam par 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-4: sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho dbo bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-5: khams gsum gyi tsher ma rim gyis shin tu dkrugs par 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-6: nyon mongs spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gi tshogs thob par 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-7: ye shes kyi mig yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-8: mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-9: 'khor ba'i 'brog las rgal bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-10: 'phags pa'i lam nas 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-11: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-12: nyon mongs pa'i tsha bas gdungs pa'i yid tshim par byed par 'dod pa rnams kyis gus par bya ba dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-13: dam pa'i chos kyi chus dbang bskur ba la 'bad par bya'o //
T10TD4172E:3b-16: dam pa'i chos thob pas sor mo'i phreng ba ma gsod pa las log par gyur pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-17: gnod sbyin 'brog gnas mi rnams gsod pa las log par gyur pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-18: klu'i rgyal po sog ma med lo tog 'joms par byed pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-19: gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma srog chags brgya phrag du ma gsod pa las log par gyur pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-20: gnod sbyin ba spu khab dug gis rdeg par byed cing gsod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-21: rgya mtshon gnas pa'i nya ti ming gi la tshong pa stong phrag du ma gsod par byed pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-22: sbal pa dud 'gro log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-23: zla ba sgra gcan gyi 'jigs pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-24: nyi ma lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-25: brgya byin ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-26: tshangs pa rtag par lta ba las dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-27: rtag tu 'tsho ba rtag tu lta ba las kyang /
T10TD4172E:3b-28: gcer bu pa'i bu log par bya ba la mngon par sbyor ba'i las dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-29: bram ze grags pa'i rigs mngon par zhen pa dam pa'i chos thos pa las log go //
T10TD4172E:3b-30: de dag la sogs pa gzhan dag tu mthar pa'i skom gyis gdungs shing srid pa'i yal ga gcod par 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-31: ma rig pa'i sbubs dral bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-32: shes rab kyi snang bas lta bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:3b-33: 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal bar 'dod pa dang /
T10TD4172E:4a-1: gi dam pa'i chos thos pas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba las rab tu 'grol bar 'gyur ro //
T10TD4172E:4a-2: de lta bas na gus par byas te dam pa'i chos 'bad pas mnyan par bya'o //
T10TD4172E:4a-4: mkhas pas nad la sman pa bzhin //
T10TD4172E:4a-5: thog mar dam pa bsten par bya //
T10TD4172E:4a-6: nad sos bya phyir 'bad pa yis //
T10TD4172E:4a-7: sman ni sman pa la nyan ltar //
T10TD4172E:4a-8: dam pa'i chos ni mnyan par bya //
T10TD4172E:4a-9: blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yis //
T10TD4172E:4a-10: sman de rnams ni thos nas su //
T10TD4172E:4a-11: gus pas sten par byed pa ltar //
T10TD4172E:4a-13: bdud rtsi de ni 'thung ba yis //
T10TD4172E:4a-14: mchog ni thob par byed pa yin /
T10TD4172E:4a-15: chos smra ba dang dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la gus par bya ba'i gtam slob dpon sa 'tsho byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T10TD4172E:4a-17: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gnas brtan aa dzi ta shr'i bha dra dang /
T10TD4172E:4a-18: lo ts'a ba dge slong sh'akya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o /
